article: Mr Smith  _  from London.Now he is in China.He is  a teacher  .He teaches English  _  a middle school .He works very hard.His students like  _  very much .He can  _  a little Chinese.His students often teaches him Chinese  _  Sundays. Mr Smith likes playing football.He often plays football  _  his students. Mr Smith  has  a son.His name is Jack.He is a student.He studies in a middle school.He goes to school  _  bike everyday.He gets home at four in the afternoon.He likes  watching  TV in the evening.
